segments.text: It's almost comical how absorbed the woman is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I realize she has no idea that there's a mini adventure happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how kids always seem to find a way to bend the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside the boy looks expectant, her palm open, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile to see their cooperation, yet itâ€™s so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of their playful mischief against the mundane chore is fascinating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what's happening right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
